author: Blitzkrieg

review: 04/22/2015 Experiencing buffering issue with FireTV stick and MLB.TV; reported to Amazon on 04/9/2015 and chatted with Amazon support.on 04/22/2015; was told it was a known issue with the App and Amazon was working with app developer to resolve. Amazon rep said expected update in 2 or 3 days; My phone and Android tablet run MLB fine on same wifi network. Amazon promised response within 2 or 3 days of 04/22/2015.I will return FireTV stick and go to Roku or Apple TV  if not resolved; I want my MLBTV. Update, went to Walmart, got a roku stick and problem is gone! The problem is definitely the Amazon stick or MLB app. Regardless, I'm returning my FireTV stick! The problem has been there for a month and has not been fixed, Amazon, you snooze, you lose!
author: Arcee

review: I already have an Amazon FireTV, and it gets a lot of use. I bought the Stick for another tv in the home. Setup is extremely easy and intuitive. Works great. I got the IOS app for my phone so that I can use the voice search, and that works well also.
author: Al

review: Works great, streaming is smooth and quick even at crappy Time Warner 15mb internet speed. Would like to see more movies/tv shows/games but understand product it new and things are being added every day.
author: cpy

review: Bought this because both Sling and Amazon had a deal where you could get this device for free, with Sling service and a rebate. Love it! It streams a lot more efficiently with the Fire Stick over my iPad on AirPlay. (Don't get me wrong, I'm a die hard Apple fan).  Easy to setup and they have a very useful product user video when you first turn on the device. Really happy with it and the possibilities it offers.
author: Andrew Torres

review: I have the fire stick hooked up to my bedroom TV and my wife and I love it. It is nice when we are binge watching something on Netflix or Hulu. The setup was simple and the picture quality is perfect. The remote works fine too! The only thing I wish it had was HBOGO but it seems a lot of the streaming devices other than Roku don't have it.
